About me

Studying Autonomous Systems at TU Darmstadt

Hello there! Currently, I study for a master's degree in computer science, specialized on autonomous systems, at TU Darmstadt. My courses are focused on machine learning and artificial intelligence. Whenever possible, I also love to teach because it feels so good to see people improve and it really helps me to evaluate my own skills. If there is something you would like to know, feel free to contact me. :)
